וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> vai-Ye-lech went אַבְרָ֗ם <WH87> 'av-Ram, So Abram כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after דִּבֶּ֤ר <WH1696> dib-Ber had spoken אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> 'e-Lav forth יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, as the LORD וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> vai-Ye-lech went אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> it-To to him ל֑וֹט <WH3876> Lot; unto him and Lot וְאַבְרָ֗ם <WH87> ve-'av-Ram, with him and Abram בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- old חָמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> cha-Mesh and five שָׁנִים֙ <WH8141> sha-Nim years וְשִׁבְעִ֣ים <WH7657> ve-shiv-'Im was seventy-five שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> sha-Nah, years בְּצֵאת֖וֹ <WH3318> be-tze-To when he departed מֵחָרָֽן׃ <WH2771> me-cha-Ran. out of Haran
